changes: Relocated the bed to the southeast corner (against the east wall) to position it in the corner furthest from both the entry door and the desk, fulfilling a critical 'Productivity Focus' style rule.
Moved the sofa to the west wall to avoid conflict with the new bed position and to keep the primary path from the door to the desk clear.
Repositioned nightstands and lamps to follow the relocated bed.
Repositioned artwork to hang above the new locations of the bed and sofa.
Moved the plant to the southwest corner to frame the 'hero' desk area without obstructing pathways.

refined_placements.table_1: Centered on and flush against the south wall, positioned between the two windows.
refined_placements.chair_1: Placed at table_1 on the west side, with its back to the center of the room.
refined_placements.chair_2: Placed at table_1 on the east side, with its back to the center of the room.
refined_placements.bed_1: Positioned in the southeast corner, with the headboard flush against the east wall. This places the bed in the corner furthest from the entry door and the desk.
refined_placements.nightstand_1: Placed against the east wall, on the north side of bed_1.
refined_placements.nightstand_2: Placed between bed_1 and the south wall.
refined_placements.sofa_1: Positioned flush against the west wall, in the area south of the kitchen fixtures. This keeps the central pathway to the desk clear.
refined_placements.artwork_1: Mounted on the west wall, centered above sofa_1.
refined_placements.artwork_2: Mounted on the east wall, centered above bed_1.
refined_placements.plant_1: Placed in the southwest corner of the room, to the left of table_1.
refined_placements.rug_1: Placed on the floor in front of the west-side window on the south wall, partially under table_1.
refined_placements.rug_2: Placed on the floor in front of the east-side window on the south wall, partially under table_1.
